meanings.definition: An instrument used to measure blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used the statoscope to check my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The nurse always carries a statoscope to monitor patients' health.
meanings.sent3: I tried using the statoscope as a microphone, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a statoscope, always observing and measuring everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The statoscope beeped softly as it recorded my blood pressure, like a tiny heartbeat.

meanings.definition: A device used to detect and measure changes in atmospheric pressure.
meanings.sent1: The statoscope indicated a storm was approaching by showing a drop in pressure.
meanings.sent2: Meteorologists rely on statoscopes to predict weather changes accurately.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the statoscope was a magical weather wand, predicting rainbows instead of rain.
meanings.sent4: The statoscope whispered secrets of the sky's moods, guiding sailors through safe passages.
meanings.sent5: With the statoscope in hand, she felt like she held the power of the wind and clouds.
